title: Pointy Serif ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_vb_5180.jpg)

I thought it might have Barbedor, but not quite right. The serifs appear horizontal and the A's crossbar is more up.

Thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content: It looks like an emboldened/expanded/low-res/artificially small-caps **[Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062719/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=FrizQuadrata%20LT%20-%20Regular&fid=aa1adf2bac906f26767f273fc6044987&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=VALLEY%20BROOK&fit=1)**
Awesome, thanks Fivos! I used WTF but it didn't show me Friz Quadrata, ugh.
